com.faunadb.common

Class Connection

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.faunadb.common.Connection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public final class Connection
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.AutoCloseable
    The HTTP Connection adapter for FaunaDB drivers.

    Relies on async-http-client for the underlying implementation.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Connection.Builder
      A builder for creating an instance of Connection.

    • Method Detail

      • builder

        public static Connection.Builder builder()
        Returns a new Connection.Builder.

      • newSessionConnection

        public Connection newSessionConnection(java.lang.String authToken)
        Creates a new short live connection sharing its underneath AsyncHttpClient. Queries submited to a session connection will be authenticated with the token provided.
        Parameters:
        authToken - token that will be used to authenticate requests
        Returns:
        a new Connection

      • close

        public void close()
        Releases any resources being held by the HTTP client. Also closes the underlying AsyncHttpClient.
        Specified by:
        close in interface java.lang.AutoCloseable

      • get

                               throws java.io.IOException
        Issues a GET request with no parameters.
        Parameters:
        path - the relative path of the resource.
        Returns:
        a ListenableFuture containing the HTTP Response.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the HTTP request cannot be issued.
